n, q = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))
b = [0] * n
for i in range(q):
    l, r = map(int,input().split())
    b[l-1] += 1
    if r < n:
        b[r] -= 1

for i in range(1, n):
    b[i] += b[i-1]

s = 0
a.sort()
b.sort()
for i in range(n):
    s += a[i] * b[i]
print(s)
